name: Beem
slogan: Elegant Mobile HR & Comms for Front-Line Employees
description:
We Are Beem!

Beem is an immediate, mobile touch point that empowers every employee to engage with their company and complete their workday more efficiently. We're a solution to Enterprise platform fragmentation & content overload, Beem provides greater visibility over your workday

Many business' and enterprises alike have a myriad of workflow, communication and content tools which are used daily to get work done. In most cases these platforms and content require the user to search, toggle and find the right piece of content. 

Beem unifies, streamlines and makes sense of this noise, surfacing user relevant content into one immediate mobile platform.

www.wearebeem.com
twitter.com/WeAreBeem

jobs.title: Head of Growth
jobs.description:
Beem is the enterprise platform of choice for some of the world’s most inspiring companies. Our mission is to create an easy and more engaging experience for employees to access the information and materials they need to be great at their jobs. Ultimately Beem helps companies communicate better with their employees and share information in a fun, engaging and mobile way.

An established name in the sector, famous for ensuring world-class service, creativity and always putting our clients and their people at the heart of everything we do. We’re backed by a team of fantastic investors who are committed to helping us grow and succeed, and thanks to some of the groundbreaking work we’ve done, Beem has picked up multiple awards over the last few years. Now Beem has the opportunity at hand to disrupt and evolve the very nature of how employees access and engage with their digital work day’s. We have a unique work dynamic that encourages creativity, risk-taking, growth and autonomy. You will be a great fit if you love to get stuck in, are a self starter and get a kick out of changing things for the better.

Role

Are you an experienced technology business developer or sales manager, looking to make a larger impact on larger global deals? Are you a driven individual with an exceptionally positive attitude and enthusiasm for everything you put your mind to? Do you have a track record of revenue generation and pipeline conversion?

We're looking for a Business Development Professional, preferably with an Agency, SaaS or Tech Startup background who is positive and highly organised with excellent sales and communication skills. 

You will be responsible for proactively developing new client relationships and securing additional business opportunities from both new and existing clients. Your role will be a focal point for new business and business development activities. An individual with a track record in a multi-channel sales and marketing role and environment will succeed in this role. You will be pivotal in shaping processes and procedures, so we can continue to grow our client base without compromising client experience.

Responsibilities

Lead Generation - research and contact potential clients to establish rapport and educate them on the product & services and be an initial point of contact in new sales and lead nurturing: from email, calls to meetings and presentations
Manage a multi channel growth strategy from the digital/social and traditional sales arenas through to inbound and outbound marketing initiatives
Manage and own the pipeline from prospecting all the way through to close, collaborating closely with the Client Success team and management
Inform clients of new developments and maximise business potential from each client relationship
Identify growth opportunities using data and creative strategy
Work directly with Clients to fully comprehend their requirements and offer our solutions accordingly
Work with marketing executives on holistic growth and sales initiatives 
Able to distil incoming enquiries and provide regular succinct feedback to our developers and management for follow up and action
Work closely with our technical team to ensure the product meets client needs and requirements
Prepare sales contracts & invoices
Own your role, have initiative and tenacity, be creative, be innovative and provide insights to the rest of the team

Skills

Prior experience in a business development, sales or client facing role, preferably with Agency, SaaS or Tech Startup background (2-4 years)
Demonstrable record of sales / business development in a B2B environment 
Consultative and/or creative sales experience
Experience and/or understanding of project management. Including working with product and technical teams
Experience and/or understanding of working with/in start ups or fast paced environments
Excellent communications skills, both written and verbal
Self evident negotiation skills
Understanding of enterprise software and/or B2B technology 
A collection of evident soft skills (problem solving, strategic thinking, adaptability, planning, time management, creativity, resilient, detailed and creative etc)
Evidence of building effective relationships with clients, partners and individuals of relevance
Highly organised, autonomous self starter with ability to prioritise and multitask
Ability to problem solve and bring timely resolution to issues
Skilled in computer software, ability to use Keynote preferred 

Nice to Haves

Keen understanding of the technology sector, able to articulate complex technological concepts simply.
Direct experience in enterprise sales and senior stakeholder management
Dealt with big businesses and understand at high level the B2B client and sales methodologies
Evidence of financial and budgetary planning
Proof you have strived, surpassed expectation and over delivered in previous roles

What’s on offer?

Competitive remuneration
Highly attractive, uncapped annual OTE
Senior position with the ability to have a voice and influence in our success story
Opportunity to work directly with the most forward thinking brands such as Nissan, Renault, General Electric, and more.
Position in a growing startup that is becoming a key leader in the employee sector
Flexibility to demonstrate your creativity and skills
Work amongst a talented and a dynamic team
Flexible working environment
